title: Eldritch Energy Source (Part 1)
body:
Eldritch Energy Source (Part 1)

Evan felt a mountain-like pressure bearing down on him the moment his hand was caught by the tentacle. He had already used almost all of his Primordial Shadow Energy in his earlier attack, so it became incredibly difficult for him to move his body as he did not have enough Shadow Energy to circulate inside his body.

'Darn it, don't grab my hand as if I am your boyfriend...' Evan shouted inside his mind, and his body flashed with white light. The moment his body flashed, he lost nearly forty percent of his world essence, but as a result, he disappeared and appeared twenty meters away from the rift.

After appearing twenty meters away from the rift, Evan panted heavily and looked at the tentacle with his eyes wide open.
